title: The Medieval Islamic Civilization-Collection16 (Thought, Phil.4)
description:
The Medieval Islamic Civilization - Collection 16 (Thought and Philosophy 4):

We have 24 titles here:

-  al-Qoz & al-Khaliat - Men & the Universe; Reflections of Ibn al-Qayyem

-  Arabi et al (Eds.) - Islamic Legal Thought; a Compendium of Muslim Jurists (2013)

-  Aslan et al (Eds.) - Muslim Theology; the Voices of Muslim Women Theologians (2013)

-  Belo - Chance and Determinism in Avicenna and Averroes (2007)

-  Bowering (Ed.) - The Princeton Encyclopedia of Islamic Political Thought (2013)

-  Butterworth - Alfarabi, the Political Writings; Selected Aphorisms and Other Texts (2001)

-  Chamberlain - Knowledge and Social Practice in Medieval Damascus, 1190-1350 (1994)

-  Daiber - Bibliography of Islamic Philosophy; Supplement (2007)

-  de Boer - The History of Philosophy in Islam (1903)

-  Dhanani - The Physical Theory of Kalam; Atoms, Space, and Void in Basrian Mu'tazili Cosmology (1994)

-  Emon - Islamic Natural Law Theories (2010)

-  Endress (Ed.) - Organizing Knowledge; Encyclopedic Activities in the Pre-Eighteenth Century Islamic  World (2006)

-  Genequand - Ibn Rushd's Metaphysics; a Translation with Introduction of Ibn Rushd's Commentary on Aristotle's Metaphysics, Book Lam (1986)

-  Inati - Ibn Sina Remarks and Admonitions; Part One - Logic (1984)

-  Kennedy-Day - Books of Definition in Islamic Philosophy; the Limits of Words (2003)

-  Kenny - Philosophy of the Muslim World; Authors and Principal Themes (2003)

-  Laliwala - Islamic Philosophy of Religion; Synthesis of Science, Religion and Philosophy (2005)

-  Leaman (Ed.) - The Biographical Encyclopedia of Islamic Philosophy (2006)

-  Peters -  Jihad in Mediaeval and Modern Islam; The Chapter on Jihad from Averroes' Legal Handbook (1977)

-  Rafiabadi & Kak - The Attitude of Islam Towards Science and Philosophy; a Translation of Ibn Rushd's (Averroes) Famous Treatise (2003)

-  Sheikh - Islamic Philosophy (1982)

-  Tymieniecka (Ed.) - Timing and Temporality in Islamic Philosophy and Phenomenology of Life (2007)

-  Vagelpohl - Aristotle's Rhetoric in the East; the Syriac and Arabic Translation and Commentary Tradition (2008)

-  Walzer - Greek to Arabic; Essays on Islamic Philosophy (1962)
